title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin congratulates Matthew Stafford on his first career playoff win after taking down the Cardinals and why it's clear he chose to work "smarter" not "harder" by making the move to Los Angeles. He gives his final Herd Hierarchy of the season with the final 8 teams remaining in the playoffs. He also believes the Cowboys are making a mistake by sticking with head coach Mike McCarthy after losing to the 49ers at home in the first round of the playoffs. Plus, former Pro Bowl QB Carson Palmer joins the show to give his thoughts on Joe Burrow leading the Bengals to their first playoff win in over 30 years. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
